org.jarivm.relationGraph.repositories

Interface EmployeeRepository

  • All Superinterfaces:

    • Method Detail

      • employeesOfAllTime

        @Query(value="MATCH total=(n:Employee)-[r:WorkedOn]->(p:Project) RETURN sum(toFloat(r.score)) / toFloat(count(p)) as score , n.name as name, n.surname as surname, collect(r.role) as roles, n.start_date_of_work as startDate, n.experience as experience, \n        n.email as email, n.age as age, collect(p.name) as projects ORDER BY score DESC, surname, name LIMIT {l}")
java.util.List<java.util.Map<java.lang.String,Project>> employeesOfAllTime(@Param(value="l")
